mdRecord.dcterms:description: This black and white photograph shows a group of ten people sitting on a spacious porch. The back of the photograph includes handwritten notes: "Cousin Alex sitting in the chair still in the kitchen" and "Just before Alex was born." The accompanying handwritten note reads as follows: "Front row, Cora Clark, Marie Wood, Harry Wood, Bette Jo Wood, Nannie Wood, Clarence Wood, Sr. holding Clarence Wood, Jr., Cousin Alexander Edward Barbour. Sitting on Bannister, Harry Lee Walker. Standing in rear left, Eliza Walker. At Blandome about 1928."
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Family at Blandome, ca. 1928 (photograph)
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Photographs
Wood, Alexander Barbour
Walker, Harry Lee
Wood, Nannie Elizabeth Walker
Wood, Clarence M. (Clarence Mosby), Sr.
Wood, Clarence M. (Clarence Mosby), Jr.
Blandome (Lexington, Va.)
